SLIDER_1_HEADER: Buy a car directly from American auction
SLIDER_1_DESCRIPTION: We find the best options, verify the history, and deliver them safely to you.
SLIDER_2_HEADER: Get the full history of your future car
SLIDER_2_DESCRIPTION: Car history, damages, and real auction photos — all through a transparent process.
SLIDER_3_DESCRIPTION: Your new car shines as beautifully as your choice.

DEALER.HERO_SUBTITLE: Join our growing network of trusted automotive partners across Georgia
DEALER.INFO_TEXT_1: NexusAuto is Georgia's leading automotive import and distribution company, specializing in bringing high-quality vehicles from American auctions directly to dealers and customers. With over a decade of experience, we've built a reputation for transparency, reliability, and exceptional service.
DEALER.INFO_TEXT_2: As a NexusAuto dealer, you'll gain access to our extensive network, premium inventory, competitive pricing, and comprehensive support services. We handle everything from sourcing and inspection to logistics and documentation, allowing you to focus on what you do best - selling cars and serving your customers.
DEALER.INFO_TEXT_3: Our dealer program is designed to help you grow your business with exclusive benefits, training programs, and ongoing support from our dedicated team.
DEALER.BENEFIT_1_DESC: Access wholesale prices and exclusive dealer discounts on all vehicles
DEALER.BENEFIT_2_DESC: First access to our curated selection of quality vehicles from top US auctions
DEALER.BENEFIT_3_DESC: Receive marketing materials, digital assets, and promotional support
DEALER.BENEFIT_4_DESC: Personal support from a dedicated team member to assist with orders and questions
DEALER.BENEFIT_5_DESC: Comprehensive training programs and ongoing educational resources
DEALER.BENEFIT_6_DESC: Connect with other dealers and leverage our nationwide logistics network
DEALER.FORM_SUBTITLE: Fill out the form below and our team will contact you within 24-48 hours
DEALER.MESSAGE_PLACEHOLDER: Share details about your business, current inventory, target market, and why you'd like to become a NexusAuto dealer...
DEALER.MESSAGE_ERROR: Please provide information about your business (minimum 10 characters)
